headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://maps.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' https://maps.googleapis.com https://www.google.com; img-src 'self' https://maps.googleapis.com data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com
